summary: Changes the appearance of vanilla skyrim dogs to resemble airdale terriers rather than an irish wolfhounds.
descriptionHtml:
Airdale Terriers dogs replacer
This is a simple texture replacer for all the grey Skyrim dogs. 

Painted using photo references and samples. Not entirely accurate coloring, but the resemblance works well with the game model.

Thanks to http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18718 Slof\'s Dogs by AlienSlof and http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3621 Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack by Bellyache. Not sure which of these I started with when I started painting, but both are great. 

I also recommend: 
No More Stupid Dog Comments by TheWinterhawk
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21225 
and
Hush Doggy by Luthrael
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22124

Install:
No esp, does not require anything but Skyrim. 
Extract to data folder or just let NMM handle it.
author: Loganfarlane
